title: visually stunning, plot misplaced
review: Animated, to me, usually means 'kids will like it'.  I could hardly keep my 5 year old in the theater.I was very happy with the look of the film, but it the plot left my empty -- and the boy bored.

title: yuck
review: Indiana Jones meets 'Scream'.Don't bother. It was on TMN, I fell asleep the first time; Had to watch the last half another time.
